item.description:
NEWS FLASH! Monday Dec. 4th

MEETUP VENUE is NOW 729 HOPE, NOT SHAZAMM STUDIOS.

We're having a little trouble coordinating the Shazamm Studios location so TOMORROW's meetup will be back at 729 Hope St. in Providence.

They close at 8pm, so get there right at 7pm is you want to get filled up on coffee and pastry.

WANTED: New Organizer for the Meetup.

I've paid through the end of December for the Meetup subscription, but since I've moved out of town, you folks will need to pick a new admin. by Jan 1st.

So, come on down and cast your lot for the mightiest meetup organizer in the land!

Thanks,

-Chris
item.name: Providence PHP Meetup January Meetup
